explanation: [0-0] A man wearing a white and grey T-shirt and a face mask stands in front of a large display screen, with some shelves behind it. The large display screen is missing an LED panel, and the screen shows a Windows desktop with various application icons, including Tiktok, Google Chrome, and Internet Explorer.

[0-6] Then, the man takes out a suction cup tool with his right hand, places his left hand on the screen, and then sucks the lower LED panel from the gap. The panel instantly turns black. He then moves it to the upper gap, and the panel instantly lights up, thus completing the installation of the first LED panel. He then continues to install another LED panel below the first installed LED panel using the same technique.

[6-11] Finally, the man bends down and puts down the suction cup tool, picks up an LED panel with both hands, carefully installs it in the missing area, and meticulously aligns the LED module with the upper module to ensure a seamless display on the large screen. Finally, the LED display screen is fully installed and displays icons of various programs normally. The man exits the screen backward.
